name: Banshee's Bellow
effect: On being hit, cause [150% AP stagger] in a [5m AoE]. (15s CD)

name: Blood Thief
effect: On kill, restores HP by [100%] of AP.

name: Body Meld
effect: On kill, grants [+100/130/130] Constitution for [30s] (Cooldown: [10s]) Stacks 3 times at kill 3 and kill 5 . (affects max HP and AP).

name: Brain Freeze
effect: On hit, increase stagger (possibly incorrect/incomplete)

name: Breath Stealer
effect: On being hit, restore/gain stamina (possibly incorrect/incomplete)

name: Bunker
effect: On being hit, [10%] chance to gain [30% armor] for [5s]. (Cooldown: [10s])

name: Chrono Skip
effect: On being hit, [10%] chance to cause [30% slow attack speed] in a [5m AoE] for [5s]. (Cooldown: [10s])

name: Death's Chariot
effect: On kill, grants [+5%] movement speed for [30s]. (Cooldown: [10s]) Stacks to a maximum of +15%

name: Deep Breathing
effect: On ability use, increases AP by [2%] for [15s] (Cooldown: [5s]).

name: Defiant
effect: On ability use, restores HP by [35%] of AP. (Cooldown: [5s]). Does not require hitting an enemy with the ability.

name: Essence Thief
effect: On kill, restores [+15] Mana/Rage.

name: Fighting Spirit
effect: On fully charged weapon hit, heals self for 75HP

name: Flare
effect: On hit, cause a [50% AP Damage] explosion in a [4m AoE]. (20s CD)

name: Flow State
effect: On ability use, [10%] chance to gain [10%] rage/mana. (Cooldown: 5s)

name: Godking's Ascension
effect: On kill, +[100] AP for [10s]. Kill causes a [300% AP Damage] explosion in a [4m AoE] (Cooldown:[10s]).

name: Godking's Passion
effect: On ability use, +[4%] AP for [30s].  (Cooldown:[6s]). Maximum 5 stack (+20% AP).

name: Helping Hand
effect: On hitting an ally, grant them HP (possibly incorrect/incomplete)

name: Inner Rage
effect: On being hit, gain [3%] Crit chance for [15s]. Stacks 2 times. (Cooldown: 10s)

name: Killer's Edge
effect: On kill, grants [+10%] Crit Chance for [15s]. Also have observed this being applied to allies. Doesn't seem to stack.

name: Kingmaker
effect: On hitting an ally, grant them [15% AP] for [5s]. (Cooldown: [20s])

name: Marrow Stealer
effect: On kill, +[10%] AP for [5s]. No cooldown. Stacks if two or more gear triggers

name: Mind Meld
effect: On kill, grants [+100/130/130] Affinity for [30s] (Cooldown: [10s]) Stacks 3 times. (affects max Mana/Rage and AP).

name: Pain Link
effect: On being hit, chance to cause [-50%] reduced movement speed and attack speed in enemies. Possibly an AoE effect.

name: Pit Fighter
effect: On being hit, chance to gain [3%] Constitution for [15s]. Stacks 3 times. (Cooldown: 5s)

name: Scatter
effect: On being hit, [10%] chance to gain [15% movement speed] for [?s]. - incomplete guess.

name: Shelter
effect: On being hit, increase HP regen. (possibly incorrect/incomplete)

name: Soul Shock
effect: On hit, deal an additional [+25% AP] damage as a separate instance (Cooldown: [?s]). Procs shortly after the initial hit. Could instead be chance to deal damage, but without a cooldown. This could also chain to other nearby enemies.

name: Spirit Meld
effect: On kill, grants [+100/130/130] Attack for [30s] (Cooldown: [10s]) Stacks 3 times. (affects Crit Chance and AP).

name: Super Heated
effect: On hit, deals [100% AP] damage every [1s] for [5s]. Hit can be blaster or ability (even a non-damaging ability). I believe tiers 2 and 3 will increase the damage ticks beyond 5.

name: Thick As Thieves
effect: On hitting an ally, grant them [+15%] movement speed for [30s]. Can be applied via splash damage. Buff is not applied to self. Will stack with other speed buffs.
